? This bishop belongs on the long diagonal, not this tiny corner. I am trying to press my advantage with a mating attack, but frankly I can't, and I don't need to. This Bishop should retreat to b2 and then I need to pull back my Knight and focus on defending my kingside. This move doesn't lose on its own, but it certainly is one big step along the road.
